20110115000006.000|20110115000008.000|CC1|DOWN DID SO BEHIND THIS HOME    
20110115000008.000|20110115000008.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110115000008.000|20110115000009.000|CC1|YOU CAN SEE THE LINE DRAPED     
20110115000009.000|20110115000011.000|CC1|OFF THE POWER POLE HERE.        
20110115000011.000|20110115000013.000|CC1|TWO CHILDREN INSIDE THE HOME    
20110115000013.000|20110115000016.000|CC1|SURVIVED BUT A HUSBAND, WIFE    
20110115000016.000|20110115000017.000|CC1|AND THEIR SON WERE ALL          
20110115000017.000|20110115000019.000|CC1|KILLED IN THE BACKYARD,         
20110115000019.000|20110115000019.000|CC1|ELECTROCUTED.                   
20110115000019.000|20110115000021.000|CC1|>> IT ALL HAPPENED IN A         
20110115000021.000|20110115000022.000|CC1|MATTER OF SECONDS.              
20110115000022.000|20110115000025.000|CC1|AROUND 5:45 THIS MORNING,       
20110115000025.000|20110115000026.000|CC1|POWER LINES CAME FALLING TO     
20110115000026.000|20110115000028.000|CC1|THE GROUND AFTER AN             
20110115000028.000|20110115000030.000|CC1|EXPLOSION DURING A HOWLING      
20110115000030.000|20110115000032.000|CC1|WIND STORM IN THIS SAN          
20110115000032.000|20110115000033.000|CC1|BERNARDINO NEIGHBORHOOD.        
20110115000033.000|20110115000036.000|CC1|>> IT WAS HORRENDOUS.           
20110115000036.000|20110115000038.000|CC1|IT WAS A HUGE, HUGE GUST OF     
20110115000038.000|20110115000040.000|CC1|WIND.                           
20110115000040.000|20110115000042.000|CC1|>> I SAW A REALLY BRIGHT        
20110115000042.000|20110115000044.000|CC1|LIGHT FLASH OUT MY WINDOW,      
20110115000044.000|20110115000045.000|CC1|AND POWER WENT OUT.             
20110115000045.000|20110115000046.000|CC1|>> BUT WHAT NEIGHBORS DID       
20110115000046.000|20110115000049.000|CC1|NOT KNOW WAS THE TRAGIC         
20110115000049.000|20110115000052.000|CC1|CHAIN OF EVENTS UNFOLDING       
20110115000052.000|20110115000053.000|CC1|RIGHT NEXT DOOR.                
20110115000053.000|20110115000055.000|CC1|HE SAYS IT ALL STARTED WHEN     
20110115000055.000|20110115000056.000|CC1|HIS BROTHER WENT OUTSIDE TO     
20110115000056.000|20110115000058.000|CC1|INVESTIGATE A FIRE STARTED
